short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AirSearch will set your default search provider to AirSearch with results by Yahoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly search the web from the omni-bar using AirSearch. 

AirSearch can be uninstalled at anytime by right-clicking the extensions icon, then choosing "remove from chrome".
